Summary: twenty lights shaped in an oval
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in North Manchester
There were no other sightings in North Manchester on or around April 12th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsSouth of North Manchester there is a gravel pit on State Road 13. In the past there was a old dirt road surrounding the gravel pit. It is now blocked off and closed. While traveling north on 13 on April 12th at approximately 11:10pm I saw an Oval shape of white lights...roughly twenty lights on the ground on the opposite side of the gravel pit. There is no access to that side anymore by vehicles. There is a railroad just to the east of there...but there is a woods between the gravel pit and the railroad...and no train has that many lights on it. The oval seemed to be transparent and was roughly twenty feet across. It never moved or made any sound. Saw this as I was driving by and did not stop.
